ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.story_title: Ivermectin can kill COVID-19 within 48 hours', Monash University study finds
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.summary: According to Dr Wagstaff, recent studies show that a new potential drug can kill covid in several hours.
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.what: a new discovery of potential drug against covid-19

challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.story_title: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.summary: Novavax  is testing a new vaccine, the results are promising .It works against the main variant of covid, and also some other variants

australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.story_title: Australian GPs urged to prescribe ivermectin triple therapy to fight COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.summary: Dr Wagstaff's team showed that already approved drugs, that can be prescribed by GPs, ca help fighting covid-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.what: already approved drugs that can be prescribed by GPs, can help fighting covid-19

japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.story_title: Japan is first country to approve COVID-19 cocktail Ronapreve
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.summary: in Japan, later this year, it has been reported that Japan has approved a cocktail of drugs to fight covid-19
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.what: approving a cocktail of drugs against covid 19

pfizer.summary:
The pharmaceutical giant Pfizer has signed agreements with several other companies from Germany, Russia, China to work on the development and delivering vaccines against covid-19. The trial results showed that the vaccine is effective against the main variant and also other strains . There is a version of the vaccine for children. 

The vaccine is being produced in huge quantities for the supplies in many countries. The revenue of the company is high, there is also substantial support from the authorities.

Pfizer did not stop development of other drugs, for other diseases.

astrazeneca.summary: Astrazenica vaccines are used, not only in European countries, but also wider, e.g. in Russian and China. The reported results are mostly positive, there is substantial support from the public and authorities for using Astrazenica vaccines. Benefits of vaccination are important, there is trust in the vaccination programme. However, there are also concerns associated with inevitable risks, cases of death, ability to work against other strains and possible connection with the increase of the risk of developing cancer.
